steps.Description: Arduino UNO is a microcontroller board based on theATmega328P. It has 14 digital input/output pins (of which 6 can be used as PWM outputs), 6 analog inputs, a 16 MHz ceramic resonator, a USB connection, a power jack, an ICSP header and a reset button. It contains everything needed to support the mic
The Arduino UNO features a barrel plug connector, that works great with a standard 9V battery.
